metadata.name: UAC Bypass Using IEInstal - File
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using IEInstal.exe (UACMe 64)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\internet explorer\\\\ieinstal.exe') AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\temp\\\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('consent.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using IEInstal.exe (UACMe 64)
